body_html:
Rebase means to put your changes on top of the current tip of the branch.

Probably something like that:

git remote add origin git@github.com:cartonwang/tensorflow.git
git remote add tfhead https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow.git
git fetch tfhead && git rebase tfhead/master
git push -u origin master
body_text:
Rebase means to put your changes on top of the current tip of the branch.
Probably something like that:
git remote add origin git@github.com:cartonwang/tensorflow.git
git remote add tfhead https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow.git
git fetch tfhead && git rebase tfhead/master
git push -u origin master
body:
Rebase means to put your changes on top of the current tip of the branch.

Probably something like that:
```
git remote add origin git@github.com:cartonwang/tensorflow.git
git remote add tfhead https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow.git
git fetch tfhead && git rebase tfhead/master
git push -u origin master
```
